attributes.action: Investigate why the BBC are allowed to sell DVD's at full price to a UK citizen when we pay taxes to make them.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Why is the BBC allowed to use our taxes (in the form of the license feed) to make programs and then sell them back to us at full price? Since we (UK citizens) pay for these programs already shouldn't we at least get a discount on them compared to other countries? Not only that but BBC DVD's are usually more expensive - why?
